Publiscations

Proceedings of the 2019 Symposium on Piezoelectricity, Acoustic Waves and Device Applications, Paper number: 18584340.
  8. Xie. L. T., S. Y. Wang, C. Z. Zhang, J. Wang (2018). An Analysis of the Thickness Vibration of an Unelectroded Doubly-rotated Quartz Circular Plate. Journal of Acoustical Society of America, 144 (2), pp. 814-821

Optimal Orientations of Quartz Crystals for Bulk Acoustic Wave Resonators with the Consideration of Thermal Properties, 2017 Proceedings of Meetings on Acoustics, 32 (1).
